markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Resonant](/Traits.aspx?ID=345)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 139 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

This weapon can channel energy damage. You gain the [Conduct Energy](/Actions.aspx?ID=704) free action while wielding a resonant weapon.
name: Resonant
